alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 08 at 3:32PM MDT until May 08 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 233... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 233. * Winds...Southeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 17 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon
